storage_account_name.title: Storage Account Name
storage_account_name.description: The name of the storage account where the raw data will be stored.

raw_container.description: The name of the container where the raw data will be stored.

scratch_container.description: The name of the container where intermediate data transformations or experimental analyst data will be stored.

enriched_container.description: The name of the container where curated data assets will be stored.

raw_data_writer_service_principal.description: The service principal for the applications to use to write immutable raw data to the data lake

data_processing_service_principal.description: The service principal for the data processing / analytics / machine learning jobs to use to access raw and enriched layers of the data lake

data_asset_consumer_service_principal.description: The service principal for the data asset consumer applications to use to access curated data assets
